extendedInfo.description: Horatio's Last Word Free!!CSI: Miami fans will get a kick out of this collection of Horatio Caine one-liners. Press the button to hear several Horatio Caine one liners. What are you waiting for ....go ahead make Horatio's day.Share with Friends to unlock more sounds.Now with Sound Grenade functionality!!Horatio Sound Grenade Instructions:1] Turn up phone volume2] Set timer3] Select sonic weapon / leave phone near your target4] Sit back, and watch reactions....LOL!!If you do not hear the audio clip you want e-mail us and we will add it on the next update.

reviews.title: Alright
reviews.comment: Be better if the options weren\'t crammed 3 high at the bottom of the screen to make room for a huge picture of horatio. Also the fact that the sound loops is annoying.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: The most retarded app ever in all of history
reviews.author: A Google User
